attributes.action: Redraw the borders of Britain. Scottish border = Hadrian's wall, Welsh = Offa's Dyke
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Also the rebuilding at main crossing points of the old Roman entrance style of Hadrians wall complete with towers and banners, as a tourist attraction. Similarly on the main Welsh crossing points, dig a dyke with  wooden spikes for motorists/tourists to look at.
